/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with scaffolding, hinting at ongoing construction or renovation work. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The street itself is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant green, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, indicating a busy time of day. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
